title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 38.10 - Renewal or amendment of specific licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 38.10 - Renewal or amendment of specific licenses

State Regulations

Any application by a licensee for the renewal or amendment
of a license shall be considered as an application for a license and shall be
filed in accordance with section
38.6
of this Part (rule); and any
such application for amendment shall set forth the reasons for such requested
amendment. In considering any such application for renewal or amendment, the
commissioner will apply the requirements set forth in section
38.8
of this Part (rule) as
appropriate. Corrective amendments of a license may be issued by the
commissioner at any time upon his/her initiative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
38.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
